bibl.title: Black Holes and Hallucinations. Notes on the Text of Menander. [En japonais, avec résumé en anglais.]
bibl.note: Full version of the paper published in: Eikasmos 15 (2004) pp. 125-138. - Surveys a number of lacunose passages in Menander in an experimental attempt at creative restoration. The passages examined are: Heros 1-16, Dis Exapaton 1-12, 30-32, 49-51, 70, 81, 83, 109, Misoumenos 8, 18-20, 29-34, 41-42 and Phasma 10-25. A postscript offers new suggestions to P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4641 and 4642 (Epitrepontes and Kitharistes).
bibl.seg: AUSTIN Colin, Black Holes and Hallucinations. Notes on the Text of Menander. [En japonais, avec résumé en anglais.]

Full version of the paper published in: Eikasmos 15 (2004) pp. 125-138. - Surveys a number of lacunose passages in Menander in an experimental attempt at creative restoration. The passages examined are: Heros 1-16, Dis Exapaton 1-12, 30-32, 49-51, 70, 81, 83, 109, Misoumenos 8, 18-20, 29-34, 41-42 and Phasma 10-25. A postscript offers new suggestions to P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4641 and 4642 (Epitrepontes and Kitharistes).
